target_name: Increase Aid for Trade support for developing countries, in particular least developed countries, including through the Enhanced Integrated Framework for Trade-related Technical Assistance to Least Developed Countries
computation_definitions:
Estimated data by international organizations (Type2)
This is Korean data prepared by international organizations through estimation and modeling.
If there are no national data corresponding to UN SDGs indicators, international data are available for monitoring.
indicator_name: Aid for Trade commitments and disbursements
indicator_definition: The gross disbursements and commitments of total Official Development Assistance (ODA) from all donors for aid for trade.
computation_calculations: Data are reported aid agencies, ministries of foreign affairs, etc.
global_indicator_name: Aid for Trade commitments and disbursements
un_custodian_agency: OECD(Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development)
graph_title: Aid for Trade commitments and disbursements
source_organisation_1: OECD(Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development)
title: Untitled
